name: proj4-coordinate-transform
description: A skill for defining coordinate reference systems and transforming coordinates between different coordinate systems using Proj4js
author: Claude Code

commands.name: define-crs
commands.description: Define a custom Coordinate Reference System (CRS)

commands.name: list-crs
commands.description: List all available predefined coordinate reference systems

commands.name: transform
commands.description: Transform coordinates from one CRS to another

coordinates.description: Coordinates to transform [longitude, latitude] or [x, y]

commands.name: batch-transform
commands.description: Transform multiple coordinates from one CRS to another

commands.name: inverse-transform
commands.description: Get the inverse transformation between two CRS

commands.name: get-proj4-def
commands.description: Get the Proj4 definition string for a given CRS
